sentences.en: A yawning North-South gulf has opened up with both sides digging in.
sentences.cn: 双方都坚持自己的立场，南北之间出现了一条鸿沟。

sentences.en: He saw the phosphorescence of the Gulf weed in the water.
sentences.cn: 他看见马尾藻在水中发出的磷光.

sentences.en: Hurricane Andrew was last night heading into the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，飓风“安德鲁”进入了墨西哥湾。

sentences.en: Iraq has been drained of its strength by the Gulf War.
sentences.cn: 海湾战争使伊拉克大伤元气.

sentences.en: It'snot just that a gulf exists in living standards— there's a psychological ravine.
sentences.cn: 不仅仅是生活水平上存在巨大差异，心理上也有鸿沟。

sentences.en: The gulf between the two leaders cannot be bridged.
sentences.cn: 两位领导人之间的鸿沟难以跨越.

sentences.en: The gulf between them yawned wider than ever.
sentences.cn: 他们之间的隔阂比以往任何时候都要深。

sentences.en: The Gulf has 65 per cent of the world's oil reserves.
sentences.cn: 海湾地区拥有全世界65％的石油储藏。

sentences.en: The problems of Israel, Lebanon, and the Gulf were tightly interlocked.
sentences.cn: 以色列、黎巴嫩与海湾的问题一环扣一环。

sentences.en: The river flows southeastward to the gulf.
sentences.cn: 这条河朝着东南流向海湾.

sentences.en: The spill could wipe out the Gulf's turtle population.
sentences.cn: 这次原油泄漏可能会使波斯湾的海龟灭绝。

sentences.en: The tremor was centred in the Gulf of Sirte.
sentences.cn: 微震的震中位于苏尔特湾。

sentences.en: There is a gulf between the two cities.
sentences.cn: 这两座城市间有个海湾.

sentences.en: These issues were brought into sharp focus by the Gulf crisis.
sentences.cn: 海湾危机让这些问题备受关注。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 北部湾（旧称东京湾，是中国雷州半岛、海南岛和广西壮族自治区及越南之间的海湾）
亚丁湾（阿拉伯半岛和非洲之角之间的海湾）
墨西哥湾（位于北美东南部边缘）
波斯湾（简称海湾，在伊朗和阿拉伯半岛之间）

trans.tran_cn: 海湾，分歧，波斯湾，（地面的）裂口
trans.tran_en: a large area of sea partly enclosed by land
